alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Johnson; Jones; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 11:30AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Cedar, northeastern Johnson, southern Jones and southeastern Linn Counties through 1215 PM CST... At 1130 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lisbon, or 8 miles southwest of Mechanicsville, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mechanicsville and Morley around 1140 AM CST. Stanwood and Olin around 1145 AM CST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Wyoming and Oxford Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
